pages.text: The Windsong is a flower that creates a wind barrier in a 5Ã—5 area, protecting the player from projectiles originating outside the barrier. Projectiles are nullified upon impact with the wind barrier. This flower requires activation by right-clicking it with a $(l:hexalia:items/hex_focus)Hex Focus$().

If a Windsong is planted in the Censer block while the $(l:hexalia:block/censer)Suction Zone$() effect is active, items dropped on the ground will be moved to the inventory of the nearest hopper in the area.
